## ItemBoxManager.unregister() method

Unregister a row of specific field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
unregister(field: string, options?: {
        skipIsFieldOfBase?: boolean;
        skipGetField?: boolean;
        skipSetField?: boolean;
        skipRefresh?: boolean;
    }): void;
```
